title: GG
body: So.. my account was banned right after i had bought skins.. not rly paid them since they were gifts. Riot mails me saying i'm not welcome anymore in the most toxic community of online gaming. Well gg moneygrabbers.com, you just banned my main i still have the smurf. duh. fucking churchkids, crying over some language. man up.

replies.body: le cry is strong in this one.
on dota this shit doesnt happen btw.
i was silver on that acc, at least now i can rank up higher
fun fact, kept spamming escile to an enemy eve last week

You scammed Rito with "bought but not paid skin" then you come asking for mercy?

Nah dude, good luck with your silver smurf, you'll come back there again.
didnt scam you retard, friends gifted me. your comment just proves what cretins make this com.

> [{quoted}](name=Arkaenam,realm=EUW,application-id=MJVj50Jw,discussion-id=6lTvIxF1,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-10-15T12:01:46.688+0000)
>
> didnt scam you retard, friends gifted me. your comment just proves what cretins make this com.

Yes and maybe your friends has some debt with Rito, haven't tought about it?
They always block accounts that makes some scam with them.

Also, you wrote this "i had bought skins", then you write something different. Learn to write, and start learning by sending a ticket to support.

> [{quoted}](name=Arkaenam,realm=EUW,application-id=MJVj50Jw,discussion-id=6lTvIxF1,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-16T16:43:14.475+0000)
>
> prenditi 50 cazzi in culo, grazie

No grazie, non vorrei rubarteli tutti :-3
intanto ho scammato, mi son fatto n'altro account dove ora ho rankato oro quindi gg riot, di nuovo, prendetevi 50 cazzi in culo tu e quella banda di ladri moneygrabbers
